<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 2"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Thaumaturge Dedication](/Feats.aspx?ID=3743) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Archetype" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=12" />
<trait label="Dedication" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=41" />
<trait label="Multiclass" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=115" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Dark Archive](/Sources.aspx?ID=129) pg. 49</row>

**Archetype** [Thaumaturge](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=186)

**Prerequisites**
Charisma 14

</column>

---

You've uncovered basic thaumaturgy. You become trained in thaumaturge class DC. Choose an [implement](/classes/thaumaturge/implements); you can use it to Glimpse Vulnerability, but don't gain its benefits. You also gain a few esoterica, allowing you to use [esoterica](/Traits.aspx?ID=427) actions. You become trained in your choice of [Arcana](/Skills.aspx?ID=2), [Nature](/Skills.aspx?ID=10), [Occultism](/Skills.aspx?ID=11), or [Religion](/Skills.aspx?ID=13); if you were already trained in these, you become trained in a skill of your choice. You gain the Glimpse Vulnerability action.

 **Glimpse Vulnerability** <actions string="Single Action" /> ([esoterica](/Traits.aspx?ID=427), [manipulate](/Traits.aspx?ID=104)); **Frequency** once per round; **Requirement** You are holding your implement; **Effect** You glimpse a hidden vulnerability and then strengthen it to aid you. Select a creature you can see. Until you Glimpse Vulnerability again, that target gains weakness 2 against your [unarmed](/Traits.aspx?ID=199) and weapon Strikes.

<title level="2">Thaumaturge Dedication leads to...</title>
[Basic Thaumaturgy](/Feats.aspx?ID=3744), [Implement Initiate](/Feats.aspx?ID=3746), [Magical Knowledge](/Feats.aspx?ID=3747), [Resolute](/Feats.aspx?ID=3748)
name: Thaumaturge Dedication
